alert.note: Alert for Indian River; St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 4:18PM EDT until April 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ST. LUCIE AND SOUTH CENTRAL INDIAN RIVER COUNTIES... At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Pointe West, or 10 miles southwest of Vero Beach South, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Indrio, Vero Beach South, Pointe West, Queens Cove and Lakewood Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
